Package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal

Class Common

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.Common
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: Common.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $") @API(status=MAINTAINED, since="0.0.5") @UtilityClass public final class Common extends Object
Helper methods for the new taglet implementations.
Author:
Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
Version:
$Id: Common.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.0.5

  • Method Details

    • createLineNumberFormatString

      @API(status=MAINTAINED, since="0.0.5") public static final String createLineNumberFormatString(int maxValue)
      Creates the format String for a line number, based on the highest possible value.
      Parameters:
      maxValue - The highest possible value.
      Returns:
      The format String.

    • determineElementName

      public static final String determineElementName(Element element)
      Determines the name of an element for output.
      Parameters:
      element - The element.
      Returns:
      The name of the element for output.

    • findEnd

      private static final int findEnd(String text)
      Finds the end of a tag in the given text.
      Parameters:
      text - The text.
      Returns:
      The position for closing bracket for the tag, or -1 if there is no closing bracket, or the text is not a tag.

    • getOutputFileObject

      @API(status=MAINTAINED, since="0.0.5") public static final FileObject getOutputFileObject(DocletEnvironment environment, TypeElement typeElement, String fileName) throws IOException
      Returns the file object for the file with the given name that is associated with the given type element. Use this to determine to storage location for a documentation file for a class or alike.
      Parameters:
      environment - The doclet environment, providing the necessary settings and helpers.
      typeElement - The type element that determines the storage location.
      fileName - The file name; it may contain a relative path.
      Returns:
      The output file object.
      Throws:
      IOException - A problem showed up when determining the output file object.

    • initHelperTaglets

      @API(status=MAINTAINED, since="0.0.5") public static final void initHelperTaglets(DocletEnvironment docletEnvironment, Doclet doclet)
      The taglets that are internally used to handle embedded tags needs to be initialised with references to the DocletEnvironment and the Doclet.
      Parameters:
      docletEnvironment - The doclet environment.
      doclet - The doclet.

    • parseNameAndEmail

      @API(status=MAINTAINED, since="0.0.5") public static final String parseNameAndEmail(Taglet taglet, Collection<? extends DocTree> tags)
      Parses the given tags for a name and an email address.

      The tag is prefixed with the tag text, and name and email address are separated by a hyphen ("-").
      Parameters:
      taglet - The originating taglet.
      tags - The tags.
      Returns:
      The formatted output.

    • processInlineTags

      @API(status=MAINTAINED, since="0.0.5") public static final String processInlineTags(CharSequence text, DocTreeFactory docTreeFactory, Element element, Function<? super CharSequence,? extends Name> nameGenerator)
      Processes inline tags in the given text.

      This method will consider only the inline tags
      • @anchor
      • @code
      • @href
      • @index
      • @literal
      • @underline
      Parameters:
      text - The text to process.
      docTreeFactory - The factory for the doc tree instances.
      element - The element where this tag lives.
      nameGenerator - A function that generates a name from a String.
      Returns:
      The text after the tags are processed.
